name: 3D Forklift Parking Challenge Simulator 2017
description:
Get ready to drive a fork lift! If you are a big fan of parking games, then you will absolutely love this one. There are two objectives in this game. First, is you must transport the cargo from one area to another. To do this, you need to navigate your fork lift to a position in front of the cargo where you can lift up the cargo and then move it to a special drop off zone. Second, once the cargo is placed on the special drop off zone, you will then need to find the parking zone to park your fork lift. This all might sound easy, but it's not easy driving and operating a fork lift! You'll soon find out for yourself! Good luck!

FEATURES

- All fork lifts are unlocked.
- Realistic graphics!
- Multiple camera views.
- Multiple steering options.
- 10 levels to complete.
- Map to show you where the cargo, drop off locations, and special parking zones.
- Hours of fun!!
